It was such a great game. The storyline, characters, puzzles etc. It is a well done game. Also boss fights are really entertaining and cool.

Such a great game. Never played a Valve game before but chose just a random one that looked cool and really really enjoyed it. The puzzels were difficult, but overtime I really got the hang of it. I also loved the storyline and all of the character's especially Wheatley's humor.

This is an all-round fantastic experience, and I'm very happy that I finally sat down and went through it. It's the perfect size serving of some of the best puzzle-platforming gameplay you'll find on a platter of a really cool environment and aesthetic. 10/10.

One of the best video games of all time. Portal 2 is seriously one of a kind - I can't even think of anything close to it in concept, gameplay, or aesthetics. It's one of those experiences I think every gamer should have, so, if you haven't already, buy the game. You'll enjoy your time with it - that is virtually a guarantee.
going thru a portal is like going thru your moms stinky poopoo hole 10/10
Very fun puzzles, great writing and voice acting as well

The singleplayer is a 10/10. Good story, funny characters, cool mechanics, and creative puzzles.
The multiplayer is a 9/10. Still really good, but it makes more sense if you've played the singleplayer first. The endings are a little disappointing, but they are funny. It would've also been cool to see some new characters besides the 2 players.
